solution_line_template: Twice Viggo's younger brother's age when his brother was {brother_age_when_2} is {twice_brother_age}*{brother_age_when_2} = <<{twice_brother_age}*{brother_age_when_2}={twice_brother_when_2}>>{twice_brother_when_2} years.

If Viggo's age was {viggo_more_than_twice} more than twice his younger brother's age when his brother was {brother_age_when_2}, Viggo was {viggo_more_than_twice}+{twice_brother_when_2} = {viggo_age_when_brother_2} years old.
Viggo is {viggo_age_when_brother_2} years - {brother_age_when_2} years = <<{viggo_age_when_brother_2}-{brother_age_when_2}={viggo_age_difference}>>{viggo_age_difference} years older than his brother

Since Viggo's brother is currently {brother_current_age} and Vigo is {viggo_age_difference} years older, he's currently {brother_current_age} + {viggo_age_difference} = <<{brother_current_age}+{viggo_age_difference}={viggo_current_age}>>{viggo_current_age} years old
Their combined age is {viggo_current_age} years + {brother_current_age} years = <<{viggo_current_age}+{brother_current_age}={combined_age}>>{combined_age} years
